cleaned_text: - - [SML](#)| [MED](#)| [LRG](#)| [BIG](#)| [HUG](#)| Chinese medicine](https://ich.unesco.org/en/RL/acupuncture-and-moxibustion-of-traditional-chinese-medicine-00425)(China) - Inscribed in 2010 ( [5.COM](https://ich.unesco.org//index.php?pg=00272)) on the Representative List of the Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity - Title as submitted EN: Acupuncture and moxibustion was applied in the treatment of knee joint pain.
